attributes.action: Place Sanctions on Israel for actions against Palestinians.
attributes.additional_details:
Place sanctions on Israel, block resources from the UK to Israel. Send aid to the people of Palestine. 

We have been shown through the war of Ukraine that the UK can take action against those whose land is being occupied and threatened. 

Boris needs to discuss how as a country we can show support to the Palestinian people

Everything that has been offered by the UK Parliament to the Ukraine needs to be matched and the same done for Palestine 

We won't tolerate oppression of the Palestinians
attributes.background: To limit resources to Israel. To place the sanctions on Israel that has been placed on Russia. To show the same support publicly for Palestinian people as they have show to the Ukrainians.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610270
